Settings.Description: A 'Mech can mount a limited number of weapons of each type, represented by 'hardpoints.` Omni hardpoints are special type which allow mounting any weapon.
A BattleArmor can mount a limited number of weapons, represented by 'hardpoints.' BattleArmors can only mount special BattleArmor Weapons
LAM can mount an internal bay to carry bombs and missiles.
Flying units can carry bombs and other weapons under their wings.
